General.Name: NRB Bearing Limited
General.Description: NRB Bearings Limited manufactures and sells ball and roller bearings for original equipment manufacturers in India and internationally. The company offers a range of friction solutions comprises drawn cup needle bearings, cylindrical roller bearings, polyamide and steel needle bearing cages, drawn cup cylindrical roller bearings, full-complement needle bearings, special ball bearings, formed strip cages for heavy gearboxes, tapered and spherical roller bearings, and planetary shafts. It also provides crankpins, thrust bearings, rocker arm bearings, other special pins. It serves the automotive industry, as well as mobility applications. NRB Bearings Limited was incorporated in 1965 and is based in Mumbai, India.
